comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: The price of Bitcoin isn't the only thing that gives it value, its also an asset of value itslef, people use Bitcoin as store of value, so whatever the price says about it still leaves it been the topic to be discussed about financially.  The price appreciation also attracts strong conversations as it has outperformed expectations of regular finance frameworks. The bullrun always keeps it highly attended to as people jump in to make purchases which is investments for them also.Bitcoin halving is also one of the major reasons why Bitcoin trends as it ushers in the bullrun with high degree of volatility.
